Bases: AnalysisBase

Class to analyse single spark dataframe, intended to show all red flags in data for a given column(s)

compare_reports(old_report: dict = {}, new_report: dict = {}, path: str = '', threshold_change: int = 3) → int[source]

compare two report dictionaries coming from same class, key by key if value increase of decrease by certain % then warning raised. return change / deviation score based on number of places where change is observed TODO: remove recursive instance method by adding internal method inside instance method

default_behaviours = {'bi_variate': ['correlation'], 'general': [True], 'uni_variate': ['unique_categories', 'numerical_summary', 'null_percentage', 'kurtosis_score', 'skewness_score', 'outliers', 'id_column_check', 'categories_distribution', 'balanced_bool']}
